name: Discord compact and hover sever panel
description:
Designed for Vivaldi tab stacking view mode.
So you can show discord in narrow width.

･Hover sever list 
  you can display server list when you mouse hover left edge.
･Resizable channel panel
  you can resize chanel panel ,so you can adjust panel width.
･Less padding and less margin to compact view.


enjoy!
